name: 蔡淑雲
objective: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
schedule:
Week 1   Introduction and Vectors
Week 2   Motion in One Dimension
Week 3   Motion in Two Dimension
Week 4   Motion in Two Dimension
Week 5   More Applications of Newton's Law
Week 6   Work and Energy Transfer
Week 7   Potential Energy
Week 8   Momentum
Week 9   Collisions
Week 10  Review and Midterm
Week 11  Kepler's Law
Week 12  Oscillatory Motion
Week 13  Mechanical Waves
Week 14  Waves
Week 15  Rotational Motion
Week 16  Angular Momentum
Week 17  Hydrogen Atom
Week 18 Review and Final
scorePolicy:
平時 作業    20%
期中考   35%
期末考   45%
